item.title: Free blogging with Hugo and GitHub Pages
item.description: Free blogging with Hugo and GitHub Pages Quick guide to your own static blog hosted in GitHub and served on your own domain. Hugo Quick start to your static site with Hugo: 1. Install Hugo brew install hugo # or port install hugo 2. Create new blog hugo new site hugo-blog 2.1 Customize your blog Edit the config.toml file change the title as you wish if you intend to use a custom domain you may want to update the baseURL as well.
